pages.text: These industrious little buggers continuously collect leaves from trees. The results of their work are also reflected in their products. While they mostly produce $(thing)Clay$(), there might be others...$(br2)Shoutout to MastroCaleb for this great mod!
The ants produce an almost silk-like material from $(item)Jade Petals$().
If you harvest a full anthill that collected leaves of colored trees with a shovel, you get $(item)Dye$().
Even better, if you bribe them with $(thing)Vegetal$(), you can even salvage pure $(thing)Pigment$() instead.
